name: @waylay/cumulocityGetMeasurements
description:
cumulocityGetMeasurements gives back the list of measurements in rawData (values).
Input parameters are :
  • dateFrom, ISO date format, default value is 24 hours ago
  • dateTo, ISO date format, default date is now
  • source
in rawData, values is an object, where the key is the time, and the value is a array of measurements.
Series defines types of data points in value array.
author: Suat
